name: Subscribe to topic
description: Receives messages that have been published to a ROS topic.

inputParameters.name: topic_name
inputParameters.description: Name of the topic to subscribe to, eg. /joint_states

inputParameters.name: topic_type
inputParameters.description: Type of the topic to subscribe to, eg. sensor_msgs/JointState

inputParameters.name: interval
inputParameters.description: Interval in milliseconds at which to expire the solution to propagate received messages. Defaults to 25ms. Messages are not queued, so if the interval is greater than the rate at which messages are published, some messages will be dropped.

outputParameters.name: is_subscribed
outputParameters.description: Indicates if the topic is currently subscribed or not.
